title: Humanoid and Siemens proof of concept shows the way to industrial deployments
description:
Humanoid successfully demonstrated its HMND 01 Alpha wheeled mobile manipulator at a Siemens production facility in Germany.

The post Humanoid and Siemens proof of concept shows the way to industrial deployments appeared first on The Robot Report.
content:
